758:10: caturthe khalu dhyāne bāhyādhyātmikā apakṣālā na vidya[nte tasmānna saṃvartano] utpādyate|
758:11: prathame hi dhyāne vitarkavicāra vagnikalpāvapakṣālabhūtau vidyete|
758:14: ityato yasyāṃ dhyānasamāpattau yathābhūto'pakṣālastathābhūtena bāhyena vināśaḥ|
758:15: caturthe tu [bāhyo'pakṣālo na pravartata iti] nāsti saṃvartanī|
758:19: kathaṃ punaretāḥ saṃvartanyaḥ kayā vā'nupūrvyā bhavanti ? taducyate|
758:28: sā tu nityaṃ tejasaḥ saptakapṛṣṭhe vāyusaṃvartanī bhavati|
758:29: ta ete piṇḍena bhavanti ṣa[ṭpañcāśat] tejaḥsaṃvarta[nyaḥ],
758:36: evaṃ ca kṛtvā prajñaptibhāṣyamanulomitaṃ bhavati-“catuḥṣaṣṭhiḥkalpāḥ śubhakṛtsnāṃ(tsnā)
758:43: yathā khalu vātapittaśleṣmabhistribhiḥ sattvānāṃ marmacchedaḥ pṛthivīdhātutvalakṣaṇo bhavati tadvadagni[jala]vāyubhirbhūrūtsādyate|
758:46: yathā cādhyātmikyastrisraścittasya tayorbhavanti vitarkavicāraprītyucchvāsapraśvāsalakṣaṇaista[thā] bāhyā apyupadravā vahnyambhovāyuprakopalakṣaṇā bhavantīti||
